TopicTitle: Outsourced R&D taking all my money

Articles.Content:
I've got "Outsourced R&D" active. In the Admin building, it says:

  • Takes 50% Funds income
  • Yields 1 Science for each 32.011 Funds.

However, when I go to Mission Control, the prospective missions take all my money in exchange for science. Even the advance. Like this:

Sure enough, I get no funds for missions whatsoever, only science. Not what I want.

My mods currently installed are:

  • RCS Build Aid v0.5.1
  • StageRecovery v1.5.1
  • SCANSat v9rc1
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux v0.6.2.11
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock v2.7.9.0
  • kOS v0.14.2

I'll experiment with removing mods and see if any are causing the issue.

Running Windows 7 Pro 64bit.

Update: I removed ALL mods from GameData (leaving only Squad and NASAMission), and it's still happening! Looks like this isn't a mod issue.

Admins, could you move this to the unmodded installs forum please?

Just goes on to show how confusing the current interface is.

Please see this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96162-Administration-strategies-bug

Also lets show Squad that there's indeed a bug with reputation.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96222-Fundraising-Campaign-strategy-at-100-commitment-results-in-negative-reputation
Wow, that's hilarious! Thank you for that

There are some bugs with the system, but this is not one of them. I do, however, agree that it's confusing.

Cheers,

~Claw

confirmed: while accepting 2 contract supposed to grant 3 and 1 science with there advance and outsourced @ 25% => no science gain

EDIT: switched to verify the "unpaid research program" this one grant science properly

Edited July 30, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
